title: Antipoisoner

fields.name: Abilities:
fields.value: - Choose someone at night to give them a dose of antipoison.

fields.name: Attributes:
fields.value:
- If your target is attacked the night after you target them, they will gain Unstoppable defense for that night.
- If your target is dealt a delayed attacked the night after you target them, the delayed attack will instead take effect immediately.

desc:
Post 2210
*This will only hurt a little.*
